title: Campbell's Green Bean Casserole Recipe
description: This Campbell's green bean casserole is a holiday favorite made with tender cut green beans in creamy mushroom soup, topped with crunchy fried onions.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Dinner Campbell's Green Bean Casserole 4.5 (855) 533 Reviews 80 Photos This Campbell's green bean casserole is made with cut green beans, cream of mushroom soup, and French's fried onions and is the perfect addition to your holiday table. Submitted by Campbell's Kitchen Updated on July 1, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 80 80 80 80 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 12 Yield: 1 3-quart casserole Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 2 ⅔ cups French's French Fried Onions 8 cups cooked cut green beans 2 (10.75 ounce) cans Campbell's Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell's Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup 1 cup milk 2 teaspoons soy sauce ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Set aside 1/2 of the fried onions for topping. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir together remaining onions, beans, soup, milk, soy sauce, and pepper in a 3-quart casserole dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until hot, about 25 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir casserole, then top with remaining onions. Bake 5 minutes more. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Recipe Tips For a festive touch, stir in 1/2 cup of chopped red peppers with the soup.Cheese lovers, try this! Omit the soy sauce, stir in 1/2 cup of shredded Cheddar cheese with the soup, and sprinkle additional cheese on top before the last bake. I Made It Print 1,473 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Campbell's Green Bean Casserole 01 of 80 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 80 Photo by  lauriebear 11/28/2024 Crowd-pleaser I read some of the reviews first, glad I did. Some helpful tips, like drying the greenbeans and how some said too salty. I used some low sodium products and substituted half and half for milk, using less.So I used 2 cans of cut greenbeans, one can of low sodium cream of mushroom soup, low sodium soy sauce and I used more French fried onions then the recipe called for, I put all 2 2/3 cup into the soup mixture and toped by sight with more (covering the top).I found it to be lovely. 03 of 80 Photo by  ZippyStock1798 11/23/2023 I read the comments right before I made it so thank you for the milk suggestion! I filled about half a can of the cream of mushroom swished it around and dumped it in. I loosely followed the recipe. Added garlic and alpine touch and cheese, instead of soy sauce used worschtehire. I thought the amount of fried onions in the casserole itself was too much only put about 3/4 of a cup in. The rest will go on top. Edit* The cook time is insufficient the cheese wasnt even melted in the middle. I added 10 mins b4 topping and 10 after. 04 of 80 Photo by  Tammy Lynn 10/18/2021 This is perfect, always a favorite. I had never put soy sauce in mine before. Love it! 05 of 80 Photo by  Angelica Rivera 11/28/2020 06 of 80 Photo by  Blessed Baker 04/12/2020 This is a family favorite! Have used this recipe for years. 07 of 80 Photo by  Blessed Baker 04/12/2020 This is a family favorite! Have used this recipe for years. 08 of 80 Photo by  Ty Kennedy 01/08/2020 Used 3 22.6 oz cans of cream of mushroom and 2 regular sized cans of green beans. Plus I used French's Carmelized Fried Onions. Tastes amazing!!!! 09 of 80 Photo by  Scott Van Peeren 11/28/2019 10 of 80 Photo by  Brian Butler 11/28/2019 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Mom's Green Bean Vegetable Casserole 26 Ratings Green Bean Casserole with Frozen Green Beans 9 Ratings Green Bean Casserole Remix 52 Ratings Best Green Bean Casserole 1,127 Ratings Jessica's Real Green Bean Casserole 4 Ratings Green Bean and Potato Casserole 100 Ratings Tasty Green Bean Casserole 177 Ratings Pearl's Green Bean Casserole 57 Ratings My Favorite Green Bean Casserole 35 Ratings Anika's Cheesy Green Bean Casserole 15 Ratings Three-Ingredient Green Bean Casserole 12 Ratings French Onion Green Bean Casserole 203 Ratings Green Bean Casserole with Cheese 5 Ratings Vintage Fresh Green Bean Casserole (circa 1956) 33 Ratings Easy Make-Ahead Green Bean Casserole 1 Rating A Hearty Green Bean and Sausage Casserole 48 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
